headline: PIZZA HUT PARTNERS WITH BACKSTREET BOYS' NICK CARTER AND HOWIE DOROUGH TO CELEBRATE THE RETURN OF ITS ICONIC HEART-SHAPED PIZZA
summary: Pizza Hut® and the Backstreet Boys' Nick Carter and Howie Dorough team up to launch The Shape of My Heart-Shaped Pizza. Pizza Hut is making things official this Valentine's Day by partnering with Nick Carter and Howie Dorough from the Backstreet Boys, one of the most iconic and best-selling bands of all time, as the pizza brand looks to Feed Good Times and celebrate the return of its beloved Heart-Shaped Pizza. Just in time for the heart-filled holiday, the collaboration brings together two icon

headline: Yum! Brands price target raised to $178 from $173 at BofA
summary: BofA raised the firm’s price target on Yum! Brands (YUM) to $178 from $173 and keeps a Neutral rating on the shares. Following Q4 results, the firm’s estimates come down slightly as it embeds higher Pizza Hut expenses, but its price target increases slightly on market multiple expansion.Valentine's Day Sale - 70% OffUnlock hedge fund-level data and powerful investing tools for smarter, sharper decisions Stay ahead of the market with the latest news and analysis and maximize your portfolio's pote

headline: Pizza Hut to close 250 locations. Are any Utah stores shuttering?
summary: Pizza Hut said it will close 250 stores in the first half of 2026. Here’s what we know about its Utah plans.
